name: Jacob Antonio
description:
Let me start by saying I am a Christian and my relation with Jesus is the most important thing in my life. I love spending time with family and close friends, travelling, camping, site seeing, dinner theatres, good movies, music, dancing, writing my own songs, riding motorcycles and Alabama Football!!! Roll Tide Roll!!!
I am a hard working honest sincere man who loves the outdoors, animals, and nature. I have a strong belief in God who has helped me through things good and bad. I believe you have to be friends and companions before you can say i love you. I know when to be serious and when to have fun and how to show you my love. I am looking for that special woman who believes and wants the same. I don’t do drama but know how to stand up for myself. I am independent but would rather have that special someone to share my days with than not. Looking to share hopes and dreams of the future with my best friend and confident..
